mapper.select: select * from l_carousel order by createTime desc limit 0,10
select * from l_headline order by createTime desc limit 0,10
select id,tagName from l_tag where status = 1 ORDER BY id asc

SELECT l.id,l.productName,l.productCoverUrl,l.rateType,l.rate,l.amountMin,l.amountMax,l.loanType,l.loanTime,l.tags,l.applyNum FROM l_loan l,l_loan_tag t where l.id = t.loanId GROUP BY l.id
order by l.createTime desc
order by l.weights asc
order by l.loanType asc,l.loanTime asc
order by l.rateType asc,l.rate asc
limit #{num},10

,l.weights asc
,l.loanType asc,l.loanTime asc
,l.rateType asc,l.rate asc
